title: swaamy sharaNam
sahitya:
swaamy sharaNam (raama)

(swaamy)



caraNam 1



sakala caraacara naayakanE en

(swaamy)



caraNam 2



agamum puramum engum nirayum manOharanE

(swaamy)



caraNam 3



iravu pagalum unnai (raama) ninaindu ninaindu (raama) - manam

uruginEn tiruvuLLam ariyum enatarumai

(swaamy)



caraNam 4



abalaiyai kaN paaraay undan abayakam taaraay (raama)

aramillaiyaa tiruvaruLillaiyaa manamillaiyaa innum dayavillaiyaa en

(swaamy)
